columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in the service

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device

columns.name: ComponentType
columns.description: Type of hardware or firmware component

columns.name: Manufacturer
columns.description: Manufacturer of hardware or firmware component

columns.name: ComponentName
columns.description: Name of hardware or firmware component

columns.name: ComponentFamily
columns.description: Component family or class, a grouping of components that have similar features or characteristics as determined by the manufacturer

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information about the components in JSON array format
